title: PyOhio 2011: Python 102
description:
Python 102

Presented by Michael Yanovich

Now you know the basics of Python. What can you do with Python? Well the
better question should be "What can't you do with Python?" In this
tutorial/talk we'll cover more advance topics that include how to use
the Python Standard Library, advance data type manipulation, and basic
network programming. This class will be more like a talk depending on
the comfortability of everyone in the class.
